title: Silveira (António da)
body: He was the captain of Diu and the 5th grantee of the captaincy of Machico, succeeding Diogo Teixeira, who died without descendants. In 1549, he sold the captaincy to D. Afonso de Portugal, Count of Vimioso.

Diogo Teixeira: Captain of Diu and the 4th grantee of the captaincy of Machico

1549: Sale of the captaincy of Machico to D. Afonso de Portugal, Count of Vimioso
